settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up for our newsletter to receive food-saving tips, edible inspiration and more.

settings.title: Packed with Nutrients and Love
settings.text: Packed with vitamins, minerals and brain-healthy Omega 3 fatty acids, our organic kelp is a nutrient-dense, delicious, everyday snack, sustainably grown at regenerative ocean farms in the USA.

settings.subtitle: How we found a climate superhero in the ocean - kelp! - and made it into tasty, nutritious, and ocean-friendly snacks.

settings.text: Before 12 Tides, our founder, Pat, was working in old-school seafood industries — think large-scale fishing and aquaculture. And what he saw made his stomach churn: overfishing, pollution and coastline destruction.

settings.title: Turning the Tides
settings.text: We knew there had to be a better way — a way to produce foods that are as good for the ocean as they are for us. And there is. Partnering with regenerative ocean farmers in the USA, we founded 12 Tides to create nutrient-dense, sustainable snacks with kelp.

settings.subtitle: Why Kelp
settings.title: The Superhero of the Ocean
settings.text: Kelp is the superhero of the ocean. It removes carbon from the atmosphere 20 times more efficiently than land crops, and it’s low maintenance—what we call “zero input” — requiring no fertilizers, no pesticides, no arable land, and no freshwater to grow. All that, and it’s delicious.

settings.text_1: Our farmers sustainably grow and harvest organic kelp in Frenchman Bay, Maine.
settings.text_2: The harvest ships to our kitchen where we bake it into umami-packed, puffed chips.
settings.text_3: Savvy snackers like you stock up on our chips to help save our oceans.

settings.subtitle: Our Kelp Farmers
settings.title: Leaders in sustainable aquaculture
settings.text: We partner with Springtide Seaweed in Frenchman Bay, Maine. Founded by Sarah Redmond, Springtide is an industry leader in sustainable aquaculture, growing the highest-quality organic kelp — including 12 Tides’ sugar kelp — in the cold, clean waters of the North Atlantic Ocean.

settings.title: Our Team
settings.text_1: The original ocean activist at 12 Tides, Pat is our founder and visionary. Making his start in the traditional seafood industry, he was disheartened by its unsustainable practices and negative impacts, from overfishing and pollution to coastline destruction. Today, Pat is on a mission to show the world how our everyday food and lifestyle choices have the power to positively impact our oceans and the future of our planet.
settings.text_2: With childhood memories of the Jersey Shore, Lindsey is intent on preserving the ocean for future generations. Her experience working for a sustainable chocolate company taught her ocean-friendly food didn’t have to compromise on flavor. It’s a message she’s passionate about as our Head of Brand, advocating for snacks that are as flavorful as they are responsible and setting the benchmark for companies around the globe.
settings.text_3: Allison is the voice of our social media channels. An avid traveler who’s traversed countries like Indonesia and the Philippines, she’s witnessed just how single-use plastics—much of which is actually produced here at home in the US—pollute island nations on the other side of the planet. So, she shows up online every day to share our mission and start ocean activism conversations with savvy snackers like you.
settings.text_4: Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo. Curabitur blandit tempus porttitor. Integer posuere erat a ante venenatis dapibus posuere velit aliquet.

settings.title: Get Snacking
settings.description: With an umami kick and a satisfying crunch, our puffed kelp chips will delight your tastebuds while restoring our oceans. Pop a bag open and see for yourself.

settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with free 'muchseas' or exclusive offers.

settings.subtitle: Why Kelp
settings.title: Our favorite ocean plant
settings.text: Packed with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants, our kelp chips are nutrient-dense and delicious. Plus, kelp is a climate-change superhero.

settings.subtitle:
OCEAN-FRIENDLY, ORGANIC
KELP SNACKS
settings.title: Kelp chips to the rescue
settings.text: If you’re anything like us, you believe snacks should be delicious, good for you and good for the planet—and you’re not willing to settle for anything less. We’re with you. These puffed kelp chips pack an umami kick and satisfying crunch while nourishing your body and restoring our oceans.

settings.title: Tide yourself over
settings.subheading: When sea-salty cravings strike, save your taste buds and our oceans with a good-for-you, good-for-the planet snack.

settings.subtitle: Our Impact
settings.title: More than a snack
settings.text: How can snacks make a difference? Not only is the kelp we source zero input, we give back 1% of our profits to restoring kelp forests in California, reversing climate change one kelp chip at a time.

settings.title: Join the conservation conversation
settings.subheading: Follow us @12tides to join the conversation on ocean conservation.

settings.text: Organic
Plant-Based
Gluten-Free
No Added Sugar
Regeneratively Farmed
Removes Excess Oceanic Carbon
Restores Ocean Ecosystems
Supports Eco-Farmers

settings.subtitle: The truth is our snacks are nothing without the ocean. We’re ocean activists at heart. With 12 Tides, we’re turning the tides on climate change, one kelp chip at a time.
Creating Ocean-Positive Food
settings.title: Regenerative ocean farming
settings.text: Partnering with regenerative ocean farmers, we’re doing our part to remove carbon from our oceans, improving water quality while providing a habitat for biodiverse marine life.

settings.text_1: Kelp absorbs carbon from the ocean, reversing acidification and supporting biodiversity.
settings.text_2: Kelp farming requires no pesticides, no fertilizers, no arable land, and no fresh water.
settings.title_3: Produces Nutrient-Rich Food that is also tasty!
settings.text_3: Kelp is rich in vitamins and minerals and has an umami-packed flavor.
settings.text_4: Our kelp is sourced directly from small-scale ocean farmers in North America.

settings.subtitle: Restoring Oceans
settings.title: Kelp forest restoration
settings.text: We support ocean restoration projects around the world, including SeaTrees’ initiative to restore kelp forests along the California coast through 1% for the Planet.

settings.subtitle: Reducing Waste
settings.title: Compostable Packaging
settings.text: Our snacks disappear pretty fast, and we think our packaging should too. 100% compostable in municipal facilities, our packaging is ocean-friendly and free from plastic.

settings.main_text:
We’ve helped reforest
339.4 square feet
of kelp along California’s coast.

settings.title: BEYOND THE REEF
settings.subtitle: Welcome to the 12 Tides blog! We are ocean activists at heart. In Beyond the Reef, we are highlighting impactful initiatives and organizations dedicated to protecting and restoring our oceans. We will also keep you updated on the latest news from 12 Tides.
